G

GameDriver - Class in com.appriskgame.view
GameDriver class launches the Risk Game and provided options for the users to create a new map or load an existing map in-order to begin the game.
GameDriver() - Constructor for class com.appriskgame.view.GameDriver
 
GameMap - Class in com.appriskgame.model
This class stores the value associated to map.It holds the values required to build the map.
GameMap() - Constructor for class com.appriskgame.model.GameMap
 
gamePlay(GameMap) - Method in class com.appriskgame.services.StartupPhase
This method starts the game by obtaining the number of players and taking the input from the players and initialize them.
GamePlayer - Class in com.appriskgame.model
This class stores the value associated to each player.
